entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
